summary: A "normal" guy who is married to a hot actress gets worried that she is involved with her costar. This worry turns into jealousy and causes problems in their relationship. This is a story about trust and a comedy about the actions between men and women.
cast: Charlotte Gainsbourg|Yvan Attal|Terence Stamp|Noémie Lvovsky|Laurent Bateau|Keith Allen|Jo McInnes|Ludivine Sagnier|Lionel Abelanski|Valérie Leboutte|Annette Hazanavicius|Jean Abelanski|Marie Denarnaud|Jean-Rachid|Céline Cuignet|Pascal Rénéric|Edith Perret|Aurélie Babled|Raphaële Moussafir|Gilles Lellouche|Emmanuelle Lepoutre|Martial Courcier|Stephane Auvray-Nauroy|Laurent Debesse|Jeremy Nedjar|Eriq Ebouaney|Ophélie Winter|Roschdy Zem|Nagui|Catherine Lara|Marc Lavoine|Jean-Jérôme Esposito|Julie Lucazeau|Lucy Harrison|Patrick Albenque|Helen Later|Gary Cowan|Eddie Crew|Bruno Mary|Benoit Rigolage-Lessard|Rachel Williams|Gilbert Zind|Alexis Bonnet|Carine Comes|Elizabeth Ingham|Craig Cremin|Jean-Pierre Dubois|Joelle Edwards|Calum Fraser|Robert Getter|Dimitri Michelsen|Philip Schurer|Ben Attal|Faustine Chevrin|Florent Bigot de Nesles|Harry Boujenah|Jean-Yves Bouvier|Jean-Michel Guerin|Michel Hazanavicius|Lionel Le Corre|Thierry Nzeutem|Emilie Ohana|Kelly Williams|Christel Garat|Virginie Aubeux|Fatoumata Diallo|Madougo Traore|Liliane Follain|Rachel Queyrichon|Francoise Queyrichon|Ginie Van Der Noort|Stephanie Verrupen|Lee Delong|Emma-Élisa GasnierBamas|Mickaël Sabah
title: Mi mujer es una actriz
